title: The Beverly hillbillies. Volume 2.
brief_description: The Clampett’s in Washington. Phil Silvers guest stars as slick talking ‘Shifty Shafers’, conning Jed out of a million dollars and trying to sell him the White House. “Jed buys the Capitol”. A continuation episode sees the Clampett’s owning the White House, compliments of Shifty Shafer. The purchasing doesn’t stop there, Shifty also has plans for Washington Monument!
